title.narrative: Eastern Partnership SME Finance Facility Phase II EBRD

description.narrative: The Action combines EBRD loans or guarantees to PFIs in EaP countries, for on-lending to eligible SMEs, including micro-enterprises, with EU grant resources to support SME lending during the crisis period and beyond.
